segment.content:
Dogus Teknoloji is the technology company at the core of Dogus Group’s digital
transformation strategy. Its main mission is to digitalize the business processes of group
companies, increase efficiency, and provide centralized management of all operations
through modern software solutions. One of the company’s largest initiatives in this direction
is the Turkuaz Project.
The Turkuaz Project integrates various business domains such as vehicles, spare parts,
procurement, customer relations, import–export, training, and finance under a single
corporate software platform. Its primary goal is to unify different units, digitalize workflows
end-to-end, and enhance transparency and efficiency across the organization.
During my internship, my primary area of work was in the Finance Module, which includes
core capabilities, such as invoice handling, payments and collections, exchange rate
variances, integration to accounting, additional budget requests, approval workflows, and
reporting. In joining the Finance team, I was involved in software development, debugging,
testing, and module integration.
Through trainings at Turkuaz Academy, I had gained knowledge on the architecture of the
project, database schema design, and coding standard in good detail. I practiced Agile/Scrum
practices such as daily stand-ups, sprint planning, and retrospectives from which I had gained
knowledge on how large projects are organized and executed. I also gained hands-on
knowledge on tools like Visual Studio, Git Extensions, and MS SQL Management Studio.
The internship provided me with technical expertise in debugging and SQL stored procedures
and clean code principles (SOLID Principles) and service-oriented architecture (SOA). The
experience provided me with essential knowledge about working with teams and effective
communication while handling real-world responsibilities in a commercial software
development project.
The internship at Dogus Teknoloji provided me with technical knowledge while teaching me
professional responsibility and team collaboration and showing me how financial operations
transform into digital systems within corporate structures.
2

score.feedback: Özet bölümü, şirketin mühendislik faaliyetlerini, stajyerin görevlerini, beklentileri ve sonuçları ile öğrenilenleri açıkça belirtiyor. Şirket ve proje hakkında somut detaylar sunulmuş (Turkuaz Projesi, Finans Modülü, kullanılan araçlar). Beklentiler ve sonuçlar karşılaştırılmış, öğrenilenler özel olarak belirtilmiş. Bu nedenle puan 80 olarak belirlendi.
